Race.Name: Elf
Race.Description: Commonly referred to as the "Fair Folk", Elves are a long-lived people who have populated many places following their retreat from Xen'drik. The stereotypical (and true) physical description of an elf includes large pointed ears; slanted eyes; elegant, angled faces; somewhat short physique, and dark forest-green eyes; finally, most differences between male and female elves are marginal.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Elf
Feat.Description: You were an Elf in a previous life Tier1: +1 Spot Tier2: +1 Dexterity Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point
